page.title: 08RECREATION - CHILDREN
page.content: In our leisure time we sometimes watch television, especially during winter. Programes we watch are 'Grange Hill', which is abaut children in a secondary school, 'Cats Eyes', about a detective agency run by women, and 'The Kenny Everett Show', which is comedy. Some of us go sailing on Carlingwark Loch. We sail in Optimists, which have one sail, and carry one person, and Mirrors, which have one large and one small sail and carry two or three people. We play with our friends, sometimes making swings or going for runs on our bicycles. During playtime at school we play football,netball,rounders,cricket or skipping. We also play on the swings and the bars. Sometimes we play games like Blue Murder where one team has to guess the other team's word by forcing the letters from them.
